dialogue.translation: Good morning. How are you?

dialogue.text: صباح النور. أنا بخير شكرا وأنت؟
dialogue.translation: Good morning. I'm fine thank you and you?

dialogue.text: أنا أيضا بخير. الحمد لله. هل لديك خطط لليوم؟
dialogue.translation: I'm also fine. Praise be to God. Do you have plans for today?
No, I took a vacation
Good morning. How are you?

dialogue.text: sbah azul nekk s bxir tanemmirt
dialogue.translation: Good morning, I'm fine thank you

dialogue.text: Nekk s lxir tanemmirt n rebbi tesɛid iɣawasen ass-a?
dialogue.translation: I'm fine thank God, do you have plans today?
No, I took a vacation

title: تحية الصباح - الشمال الجزائري
scenario: تحية شخص في الصباح في الشمال الجزائري

dialogue.translation: Good morning. How are you?
Good morning. Fine. May you live long and you?

dialogue.text: بخير.الحمد لله. كاش ما عندك اليوم؟
dialogue.translation: Fine. Praise be to God. Do you have anything today?
No, I took a vacation

title: تحية الصباح - الغرب الجزائري
scenario: تحية شخص في الصباح في الغرب الجزائري

dialogue.translation: Good morning. How are you?

dialogue.text: صباح النور. راني غايه صحيت ونتا؟
dialogue.translation: Good morning. I'm fine, I woke up well and you?

dialogue.text: انا تاني غايه. كشما عندك اليوم؟
dialogue.translation: I'm also fine. What do you have today?
No, I took a vacation

title: تحية الصباح - الشرق الجزائري
scenario: تحية شخص في الصباح في الشرق الجزائري

dialogue.translation: Good morning. Are you fine?
Good morning. I'm fine. May God give you long life and you?

dialogue.text: حتانا لاباس كشما عندك قضيات ليوم؟
dialogue.translation: I'm also fine, what do you have to do today?
No. I took a vacation

title: تحية الصباح - الجنوب الجزائري
scenario: تحية شخص في الصباح في الجنوب الجزائري

dialogue.translation: Good morning. How are you?
Good morning. I'm fine and you?

dialogue.text: أنا تاني. لاباس كش ماراح دير ليوم؟
dialogue.translation: Me too. I'm fine, what are you going to do today?
Nothing, I'm on vacation
